data.oai_dc:dc: This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Tri, Ngo Van, Grismer, L. Lee, Thai, Pham Hong, Wood, P. L. (2014): A new species of Hemiphyllodactylus Bleeker, 1860 (Squamata: Gekkonidae) from Ba Na – Nui Chua Nature Reserve, Central Vietnam. Zootaxa 3760 (4): 539-552, DOI: http://dx.doi.org/10.11646/zootaxa.3760.4.3
